Created an attachment (id=67283)
fix

we should have been using ListIterator when going over the list of all configurations when looking for ones of a particular type, as the launch manager can be notified of a LC added or removed (which modifies the listing of all configuraitons, causing the error) at any time while we are traversing the list.

Created an attachment (id=67284)
proposed patch

A list iterator just allows a list to be modified by that iterator while iterating (it does not allow for modifications to the underlying list by different threads at the same time). This patch using synchronization to avoid different threads accesing/iterating throught the config list concurrently.
